ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] ATTENTION ALL TINKERERS
ygData.msgSnippet: Tinkering is not be ignored, it s being worked on.  Abashi has recently stated this.  Things take time however and we ll just have to be patient. One note:
ygData.messageBody:
Tinkering is not be ignored, it's being worked on. Abashi has recently
stated this. Things take time however and we'll just have to be patient.

One note: they will be opening the tradeskill board next week so make
sure you post your tinkering suggestions there.

QdP

--- jcs0001@... wrote: > Once again, it is time for us to show our
need for a tinkering upgrade!
>
> This weekend Pick an ACTIVE (within first 5 pages) Tinkering Topic and
> Post!!!
>
> Keep these threads alive! We need to have four to five 50+ post topics
> waiting for Verant
> when they walk in the office on Monday!
>
> We MUST get a reply adressing why Tinkering is being Ignored!!!
>
> Go to
>
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/cgi-bin/forumdisplay.cgi?action=top
> ics&number=2&forum=General+Discussion&DaysPrune=2&startpoint=40
> and POST POST POST !!!!
>
> The only other time they have listened to us was when Fulcrum's
> spear-headed
> a board-assault!
>
> Now things to remember:
>
> Do not needlessly bump these topics, please post your direct thought on
> the
> tinkering issue. A thread full of text is a LOT better than a thread
> full of
> BUMP BUMP BUMP....
>
> Do not create any MORE threads To this count there are 8 threads on the
> front page, please keep 4-5 at the TOP
>
> PLEASE HELP THE TINKERERS!!!!!
>
